title: Housing Market, Apple Downgrade, Recession Impact on Minorities
itunes:title: Housing Market, Apple Downgrade, Recession Impact on Minorities
description:
Aneeka Gupta, Director of Macroeconomic Research at WisdomTree, joins to discuss the housing market and give her insights on markets and interest rates. Dave Harden, Founder and President of Summit Global Investments joins the show to discuss investment strategies and markets. Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Analyst Anurag Rara joins to talk about Apple's downgrade and their outlook. Vince Cignarella, Global Macro Strategist with Bloomberg News, joins the show to give his take on markets. Jay Bryson, Wells Fargo Chief Economist, joins to discuss the impact a recession could have, particularly on minorities and the Hispanic population. Hosts are Matt Miller and Paul Sweeney.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
